channel.title: Content and Product on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Content and Product on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Whats the problem with depth of catalogue?
item.description: It's like trying to sell ice creams to eskimos - do you go for depth and variety of your content catalogue or stick to the sickly seasonal or monthly favourites - you can be damned either way.
